alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Nassau and central Duval Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 559 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Yulee to near Jacksonville. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, St. Marys, Jacksonville International Arpt, Mandarin, Arlington, Yulee, Baymeadows, Cisco Gardens, Ortega and Nas Jax. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. For boaters on or near the St Johns River, move to a safe shelter now! Do not be caught on or near the water. Gusty winds and choppy waves are likely. Make sure all on board are wearing life jackets.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval
